did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Diaries of Isaac Purdy, a farmer and grape grower, and his son J. Harvey Purdey, of Yates County, New York discuss the Purdy's daily chores and social life, and the chores of Isaac Purdy's wife Amelia. Includes much discussion on grape growing.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Diaries of Isaac Purdy, a farmer and grape grower, and his son J. Harvey Purdey, of Yates County, New York discuss the Purdy's daily chores and social life, and the chores of Isaac Purdy's wife Amelia. Includes much discussion on grape growing.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Purdy family Diaries, #3797. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
